verses.verse: For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G5484><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>, the prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> goyim <S%G1484><s%>,

If <S%G1489><s%> ye have heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of the dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5685><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you-ward <S%G5209><s%>:

How that <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> he made known <S%G1107><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%>; (as <S%G2531><s%> I wrote afore <S%G4270><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> few words <S%G3641><s%>,

Whereby <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3739><s%>, when ye read <S%G314><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, ye may <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> <S%G5658><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> knowledge <S%G4907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>)

Which <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> ages <S%G1074><s%> was <S%G1107><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> made known <S%G1107><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto the sons <S%G5207><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> it is <S%G601><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> emissarys <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>;

That the goyim <S%G1484><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> fellowheirs <S%G4789><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the same body <S%G4954><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> partakers <S%G4830><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%>:

Whereof <S%G3739><s%> I was made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%>, according <S%G2596><s%> to the gift <S%G1431><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5685><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> the effectual working <S%G1753><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>.

Unto me <S%G1698><s%>, who am less than the least <S%G1647><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>, is <S%G1325><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, that I should preach <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5670><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the goyim <S%G1484><s%> the unsearchable <S%G421><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> to make <S%G5461><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men see <S%G5461><s%> <S%G5658><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of the mystery <S%G3466><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning of the world <S%G165><s%> hath been hid <S%G613><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> <S%G5660><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>:

To the intent that <S%G2443><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> unto the principalities <S%G746><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> powers <S%G1849><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places might be known <S%G1107><s%> <S%G5686><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> the manifold <S%G4182><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>,

According to <S%G2596><s%> the eternal <S%G165><s%> purpose <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he purposed <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%>:

In <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> access <S%G4318><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I desire <S%G154><s%> <S%G5731><s%> that ye faint <S%G1573><s%> <S%G5721><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> tribulations <S%G2347><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G5484><s%> I bow <S%G2578><s%> <S%G5719><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> knees <S%G1119><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>,

Of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> family <S%G3965><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1909><s%> <S%G1093><s%> is named <S%G3687><s%> <S%G5743><s%>,

That <S%G2443><s%> he would grant <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5632><s%> <S%G5630><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, to be strengthened <S%G2901><s%> <S%G5683><s%> with might <S%G1411><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the inner <S%G2080><s%> man <S%G444><s%>;

That Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> may dwell <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5658><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> ye, being rooted <S%G4492><s%> <S%G5772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> grounded <S%G2311><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love <S%G26><s%>,

May be able <S%G1840><s%> <S%G5661><s%> to comprehend <S%G2638><s%> <S%G5641><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the breadth <S%G4114><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> length <S%G3372><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> depth <S%G899><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> height <S%G5311><s%>;

And <S%G5037><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, which passeht <S%G5235><s%> <S%G5723><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye might be filled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%> with <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto him that is able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5658><s%> exceeding <S%G5228><s%> abundantly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5731><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> think <S%G3539><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> that worketh <S%G1754><s%> <S%G5734><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>,

Unto him <S%G846><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ages <S%G1074><s%>, world <S%G165><s%> without end <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
